m_szDocTitle: Patent US20110104571 - Nano-structured anode compositions for lithium metal and lithium metal-air ... - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Nano-structured anode compositions for lithium metal and lithium metal-air secondary batteries US 20110104571 A1 Abstract This invention provides a nano-structured anode composition for a lithium metal cell. The composition comprises: (a) an integrated structure of electrically conductive nanometer-scaled filaments that are interconnected to form a porous network of electron-conducting paths comprising interconnected pores, wherein the nano-filaments have a transverse dimension less than 500 nm; and (b) micron- or nanometer-scaled particles of lithium, a lithium alloy, or a lithium-containing
